actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to provide a partial exclusion from gross income for individuals and interest received by individuals.
short_title: Middle-Income Savings and Investment Act of 1999

summary.text: Middle-Income Savings and Investment Act of 1999 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to exclude from individual gross income up to $200 ($400 for joint filers) of the sum of dividends from domestic corporations or interest. Sets forth related provisions with respect to: (1) distributions from regulated investment companies and real estate investment trusts; and (2) nonresident aliens.

titles.title: Middle-Income Savings and Investment Act of 1999
A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to provide a partial exclusion from gross income for individuals and interest received by individuals.
